title: Dagdag pondo sa GCash Pera Outlet Wallet gamit ang GCash wallet o GGives
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [GCash Pera Outlet Terms and Conditions](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/46184546420633-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Terms-and-Conditions)
- [GCash Pera Outlet Commissions and Fees](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45731364203801-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Commissions-and-Fees)
- [Paano mag fund-in sa GPO Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45731124127513-Paano-mag-fund-in-sa-GPO-Wallet)
- [Mag-apply bilang isang GCash Pera Outlet Partner](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408281111577-Mag-apply-bilang-isang-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Partner)
- [Official GCash Pera Outlet Distributors](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/8933242417817-Official-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Distributors)
- [Alamin ang status ng GCash Pera Outlet application](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/23470661850521-Alamin-ang-status-ng-GCash-Pera-Outlet-application)
- [Paano makahanap ng Authorized GCash Pera Outlet](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/34827978831513-Paano-makahanap-ng-Authorized-GCash-Pera-Outlet)
- [Dagdag pondo sa GCash Pera Outlet Wallet gamit ang GCash wallet o GGives](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/11623141909657-Dagdag-pondo-sa-GCash-Pera-Outlet-Wallet-gamit-ang-GCash-wallet-o-GGives)
- [Paano gamitin ang mga services ng GCash Pera Outlet](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4403373330713-Paano-gamitin-ang-mga-services-ng-GCash-Pera-Outlet)
- [Manage your Pera Outlet account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/24263721962137-Manage-your-Pera-Outlet-account)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/4407792390297-Sari-Sari-Store)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Maglagay ng pondo sa inyong GCash Pera Outlet wallet. Ito ay pwedeng manggaling sa inyong GCash wallet o kung hindi sapat ang pera sa inyong GCash wallet, pwedeng gamitin ang GGives.

Sundan ang sumusunod para mag-dagdag ng pondo sa GPO wallet.

![final](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/20409490379033)

Ang pagpasok ng pondo sa GCash Pera Outlet ay **real-time upon completion of transaction**.

## Need more help?

Kung hindi pumasok o nag-reflect ang pondo sa iyong GPO wallet **sa loob ng 1 oras**, sundin ang sumusunod na steps:

- I-check ang inyong GCash wallet kung nabawasan. Kung GGives naman ang ginamit sa pagdagdag ng pondo, i-tap ang Borrow > GGives para makita kung may existing GGives loan
- Siguraduhin na malakas ang internet connection nung nag dagdag pondo
- Maghintay ng 2 araw para mag-reflect ang transaksyon
- Kapag nabawasan ang GCash wallet at GGives, pero wala pa ring pumapasok na pondo sa GCash Pera Outlet pagkatapos ng 2 araw, [click here para mag-file ng report](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcash_pera_outlet__sari_sari_store___gcash_pera_outlet_wallet_top_up__hindi_pa_din_pumasok_sa_aking_gcash_pera_outlet_wallet_ang_top_up_na_amount_makalipas_ang_2_araw) at ma-validate ng GCash support ang iyong transaction
